text: Bhadra is a 2001 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Mammy Century, starring Shankar and Vinaya Prasad in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/bhadra-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Shankar as Rocky * Vinaya Prasad as Subadra * Baiju as Boban * Captain Raju * Anitha as Manumol * Jagadish as Jayadevan * Kanakalatha * Mala Aravindan as Pilla * Ponnamma Babu as Jayadevan's mother * Sarath Haridas *Sathaar as MP Sebastian Joseph *Meena Ganesh as Jayadevan's grandmother *Salim Kumar as Sundaran *Mamukkoya ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Bhadra (2001 film)
